title: Audience Considerations
text: Tailoring content for specific audience groups enhances engagement and understanding. It's not a strict requirement to create unique content for every single audience.

title: Distinctive Audiences
text: It may be helpful based on the context to combine two distinct audiences into one, or keep them separate based on what the presentation is hoping to achieve.

title: Resources and Time
text: Creating a presentation that is tailored to every single audience can be time-consuming.

title: Generalization
text: Even if audiences hold different roles, it is likely that the same information can be generalized across groups.
